import*as actionTypes from"./orderActionTypes";import axios from"axios";export var addToCart=function addToCart(data,size){return{type:actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART,data:data,size:size};};export var selectSize=function selectSize(size){return{type:actionTypes.SELECT_SIZE,size:size};};export var submitForm=function submitForm(){return{type:actionTypes.SUBMIT_FORM};};export var submitOrder=function submitOrder(item){return function(dispatch){axios.post("/api/orders",item).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:actionTypes.SUBMITTED});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);// dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data, err.response.status));
});};};export var deleteFromCart=function deleteFromCart(id){console.log(id);return{type:actionTypes.DELETE_FROM_CART,id:id};};export var toggleCart=function toggleCart(){return{type:actionTypes.TOGGLE_CART};};
